entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @MikeJoPro Trump gets a -10! Not only the Very Worst but in January if Trump had informed everyone of Pandemic United States would have been able to get control. Instead he sweeps situation under rug to keep stock market numbers up. Trump worst President in history.
